content: **knitted wrist-warmers in drops alpaca and drops kid-silk the piece is worked in rib ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the autumn s hush headband pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern z-1004 yarn group a + a or c ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - m/l **yarn** drops alpaca from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-50 g colour 607 brown and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25-25 g colour 35 chocolate **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm **knitting gauge** 20 stitches in width and 27 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/242-18-autumns-hush-headband
